label: message_inserted_at
description: Date and time response is logged

label: question_level
description: The level of the question from the GPF (roughly equivalent to grade levels)

label: question_micro_lesson
description: The specific skill from the GPF, first the grade and then the construct (Numeracy, Algebra, Geometry, Statistics) then the specific skill. Final number is the Rori breakdown of lessons for that skill

label: question_number
description: Question number within the micro lesson (each have 10)

label: answer_type
description: Answer API response, values can be "wrong_answer", "correct_answer", or "other" which is a response not related to answering the math question e.g. a keyword or clicking a menu button

label: condition_code
description: Human reater explanation of "other" responses from API and potential input errors

label: human_label
description: Human raters' response upon reviewing "other" reponses and input errors
